text: David John Finlay Jr. (born 31 January 1958) is a Northern Irish former professional wrestler and road agent. He is currently signed to the WWE and works as a trainer for them. Finlay also Is known for his time wrestling for World Championship Wrestling (WCW) and World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) under the ring name Finlay. He has held both the WCW World Television Championship and the WWE United States Championship. On December 22, 2012, Finlay decided to retire as an in-ring competition. In his last match, he teamed with his son David Finlay Jr and they defeated Robbie Brookside and "Dirty" Dan Collins in an Irish street fight. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Northern Irish sportspeople Category:Professional wrestling executives Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from Belfast
title: Fit Finlay
